text_block_list.text:
It was the summer training camp. We'd settled into the routine, 
running every day on the beach. Then one day…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Phew! How about that! My times are really improving, huh.

They really were. The fruits of her hard work at the training 
camp were plain to see.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
If can get times like that on sand, imagine 
how I'll go on a real course…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Pff, if only. I don't think it's quite that simple. For a start, 
everyone else is training like this too…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, sorry, I shouldn't say stuff like that to you after all the 
support you've given me. I need to stop being such a downer.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But that's my problem, not yours. Just 
pretend I didn't say anything, 'kay?
Just then, we heard voices approaching from down the beach…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
…if I'd know there was going to be a festival 
I'd have brought something to wear…!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Hey, it's a festival. It'll be fun whatever you're wearing!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Oh, there's a festival going on, huh?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Now there's an idea!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah, I love a good festival. But not, like, 
the big ones, you know? I mean those little local 
ones they have in the park and stuff.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah, me and my friends back home… 
the times we had…! So many memories…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
You might not think it to look at me, but they all said I danced 
the best bon-odori they'd every seen!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Heh… pretty great, huh? A racehorse who can't 
win races but dances a mean bon-odori! As talents 
go, I think it kind of suits me.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, I think that's enough reminiscing for now. What do you 
say we get down to the festival and let our hair down a little?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah, this is what I'm talking about. 
It's just not summer without a little festival!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Where next, where next… we've got yakisoba, we've got 
corn on the cob… squid on a stick! I love squid on a stick!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I think I've earned a reward after all that running! 
I'm going to get one of everything!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
You too, trainer-san, don't hold back! 
I can't get wild over here all by myself!
As we were making our way around the festival stalls…

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text: Bon-odori Grand Prix! Sign up here for the big dance contest!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Bon-odori Grand Prix…?
choice_data_list: I'd love to see that famous bon-odori of yours!
I'd love to see that famous bon-odori of yours!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: What!? No, I mean… I couldn't possibly, I…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
When I said I was a good dancer I meant, like, 
compared to my friends. I'm not about to dance 
in some big competition or anything.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
No, I just want to have a nice time, dancing with a few friends 
in the park. That's more my speed.
choice_data_list: But… your friends could see you were good, right?
But… your friends could see you were good, right?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Well, I don't know, maybe…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, trainer-san, you're the worst. 
I told you before, flattery will get you nowhere!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Anyway! We still have all these stalls to see! 
Come on, I want to get a baked potato…! Come on, let's go!

Nice Nature made a quick exit and I hurried after her. 
The Bon-odori Grand Prix would have to wait for now…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh, I am stuffed! I ate so much… 
maybe I got a little carried away…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Alright! We should probably be getting back. 
Another big day of training tomorrow!
Then, just as we were about to set off back to the lodge…

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text:
Bon-odori Grand Prix! Last call! 
Last call to sign up for the big Bon-odori Grand Prix!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Hey, so… uh…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Do you really want to see it? Y'know, my… dance.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I mean… it was just some of my friends who said it was pretty 
good, it's not, like, special or anything…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Alright. I'll do it.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But don't get your hopes up, alright? I haven't danced the 
bon-odori for a long time, you know?
choice_data_list: Alright! Now, get out there and win that thing!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Hey, what did I JUST say!?
And so, Nice Nature entered the dance competition after all…

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text: Aaaand the winner of this year's Bon-odori Grand Prix… is……!

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text:
Number 12, all the way from Tracen Academy… 
MC: …the dancing horsegirl, NICE… NEECHAN!!!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: That's NATURE, ya idiot! Wait, what? I won…!?

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text:
That's right! You wowed all our judges with your commitment 
and passion! The vote was unanimous! Congratulations!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Well, uh… thank you!

text_block_list.name: MC
text_block_list.text:
Let's have a huge round of applause 
for our winner… NICE NEECHAN!
(Clapclapclapclap!!!)

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: It's not "neechan" it's… oh, never mind. Th… thank you.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Well how do you like that, huh? I actually won!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, thanks! I don't know, I just thought 
I might as well give it a try.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Maybe that's it. I try things I wouldn't when you're around. 
You're good at talking me into stuff.
choice_data_list:
It's not me. I think you're just learning 
to be honest about what you really want.

It's not me. I think you're just learning 
to be honest about what you really want.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah. I'll be sure to keep your psych assessment in mind.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Alright. Starting tomorrow I'm going to train extra hard. 
Today: the dancefloor. Tomorrow: who knows…? Hehe…
